member.name: T:csharp_console.RandomExtensions
member.summary: Some extension methods for for creating a few more kinds of random stuff.

member.name: M:csharp_console.RandomExtensions.NextGaussian(System.Random,System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Generates normally distributed numbers. Each operation makes two Gaussians for the price of one, and apparently they can be cached or something for better performance, but who cares.

member.name: T:csharp_console.Services.DBService
member.summary: Singleton class for more performance on client and to reduce the amount of requests to server.
